name: Pizza Pass
description:
A simple game made for the 2 Buttons Game Jam.

Due to an accident, Prisoners and Civis have been mixed. Luckily, you are the best supervisor ever and sending the Prisoners back to the Prison and the Civis to the city, will be no problem at all!

Controls:

A & D or Left Arrow & Right Arrow

BGM used made by:

Filippo Vicarelli (@themiditamer)
https://www.filippovicarelli.com/
